titles.title: A bill to amend certain provisions of title 5, United States Code, relating to the treatment of Members of Congress for retirement purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16754)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 11/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Civil Service Retirement System (CSRS) and the Federal Employees' Retirement System (FERS) to: (1) limit the maximum CSRS annuity payable to Members of Congress with respect to cost of living adjustments to the final pay of the Member with respect to whom the annuity is paid; and (2) make other changes in the computation of CSRS and FERS annuities payable to Members, including eliminating adjustments for previous service as a congressional employee.
